06/2011 - 01/2013, Temporary Agent at OHIM Alicante
http://oami.europa.eu/
Enterprise Software Architect - Architecture, Processes and Quality Service.

ul.li: Reorganised quality standards according to high-level architectural principles.
Developed and promoted a new Continuous Integration process, industrializing the release procedure across services (DEVEL->QC->PROD).
Designed a common data access framework based on Spring+Hibernate JPA.
Managed the software catalogue (CMDB), reduced the library chaos (Maven, Nexus) and defined roadmaps for critical appliances.
Proposed several improvements validated by the Enterprise Architecture Board.
